class.name: OpenXRSpatialComponentBounded3DList
class.brief_description: Object for storing the queries bounded3d result data.
class.description: Object for storing the queries 3d bounding box result data when calling [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.query_snapshot].

method.name: get_center_pose
method.description: Returns the center of our bounding box for the entity at this [param index].

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the size of our bounding box for the entity at this [param index].
